name: HORIZON (itch) (CROW'S NEST, Narasu, JackLuxon, TENCONCRETECUBES, Sapient44)
name_original: HORIZON (itch) (CROW'S NEST, Narasu, JackLuxon, TENCONCRETECUBES, Sapient44)
description:
Welcome to HORIZON! Hit the notes when the line moves up and down to the beat!

Key Features

  • 6 button mania-style rhythm game with a twist: the notes don't scroll, but the strike line does!
  • 3 original songs
  • 2 difficulty levels per song
  • Leaderboards on every song and difficulty

Controls

  • Use the mouse to navigate through menus
  • Press Esc to back out of a menu or back out of a song
  • Press SDFJKL to hit notes on that key's respective lane
  • Additionally, pressing QWEIOP does the same

Credits

  • Programming: rollingcrow
  • Music: Jack Luxon, Naru, TENCONCRETECUBES
  • Art: TENCONCRETECUBES, Kenney, patchakorn phom-in
  • Fonts: Solid Snake's Game Shrine
  • Playtesting: Sapient44, Kaz, all our anonymous playtesters
